recipes.title: Savory French Toast Sticks
recipes.description: ‚≠êSavory French Toast Sticks made with bread, eggs, milk and grated cheese. Perfect for breakfast.
steps: Cut bread into sticks.
Whisk eggs with milk, cheese, salt, pepper, and chili.
Dip sticks and fry until golden on each side.
Serve warm with grated cheese sprickled on it.

stepFlow.text: Whisk eggs, milk, cheese and spices.
Fry until golden on each side.
Arrange on a plate and sprickle with grated cheese.
Congratulationsüéä, you have just completed this recipe.

notes.defaultTip: Use slightly stale bread for better texture.

leftovers.storage: Store in fridge in airtight container

recipes.title: Plantain Nachos
recipes.description: ‚≠êCrispy plantain nachos made with ripe plantains, melted cheese, and fresh toppings. A perfect snack or party appetizer with a savory crunch.
ingredients: Sour cream or yogurt for topping
steps: Slice the plantains thinly and toss with olive oil and salt.
Bake at 180¬∞C (350¬∞F) for 20 minutes until crispy.
Remove from oven and top with shredded cheese and diced toppings.
Bake for 5 more minutes until the cheese melts.
Serve warm with a dollop of sour cream or yogurt.

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Apple Nachos
recipes.description: ‚≠êCrisp, sweet, and drizzled with creamy peanut butter. These Peanut Butter Apple Nachos are the perfect quick snack when you want something fresh but still a little indulgent. Thin apple slices are topped with peanut butter, chocolate drizzle, and a sprinkle of granola for a fun, no‚Äëbake treat that‚Äôs ready in minutes. Great for after‚Äëschool snacking, light desserts, or a healthier twist on classic nachos.
steps: Cut apples into thin slices.
Layer apple slices on a plate.
Melt peanut butter and drizzle it on the layered apples.
Add the chocolate drizzle as well and sprickle the granola or crushed nuts.

recipes.title: Spicy Peanut Butter Popcorn
recipes.description: ‚≠êSpicy Peanut Butter Popcorn made with popcorn, peanut butter and honey. Perfect for movie nights and small snacks.
steps: Melt peanut butter, honey, and chili powder in a pot under low heat.
Pour over already cooked popcorn and mix evenly.
Let cool slightly before serving.

recipes.title: Instant Ramen Taco
recipes.description: ‚≠êInstant Ramen Taco made with instant noodles, egg, lettuce and shredded cheese. Perfect for breakfast and tasty snacks.
ingredients: Lettuce, shredded chicken, spicy mayo(for filling)
steps: Cook noodles slightly, then mix with beaten egg.
Shape into small taco shells using foil molds.
Fry until crispy and golden.
Fill with your choice of toppings.

recipes.title: Spicy Corn & Coconut Bites
recipes.description: ‚≠êSpicy Corn & Coconut Bites made with Sweet corn, Grated coconut, Lime juice and Chili flakes. Perfect for instant and tasty snacks.
steps: Mix corn, coconut, chili flakes, and salt in a bowl.
Squeeze lime juice into the mixture and mix.
Form the mixture into small balls and chill for 10min before serving.

recipes.title: Plantain Cinnamon Rolls
recipes.description: ‚≠êPlantain Cinnamon Rolls made with ripe plantain, ground cinnamon and butter. Perfect for appetizers.
steps: Peel the plantain and slice it lengthwise into very thin, flat strips.
Lightly bake the strips in a little butter for 3 minutes until soft and flexible (not crispy).
Mix sugar (or honey) with cinnamon in a small bowl.
Spread a thin layer of the cinnamon mix over each warm plantain strip.
Gently roll each strip like a cinnamon roll and secure with a toothpick(s) or skewer(s) if needed.
Let cool slightly and enjoy warm!

recipes.title: Plantain Egg Cups
recipes.description: ‚≠êPlantain Egg Cups made with ripe plantain, egg and salt. Perfect for breakfast.
steps: Preheat your oven for 10 minutes to 180¬∞C (350¬∞F).
Slice the plantain into thin rounds.
Lightly grease muffin cups with oil and press the plantain slices into the bottom to form a base.
Crack an egg into each muffin cup over the plantain base.
Sprinkle a pinch of salt and pepper on each.
Bake for 12‚Äì15 minutes, or until the eggs are set to your liking.
Let them cool slightly before carefully removing from the muffin tin.

recipes.title: Choco Chili Banana Chips
recipes.description: ‚≠êChoco Chili Banana Chips made with ripe plantain, dark chocolate and chili powder. A perfect snack or party appetizer with a savory crunch.
steps: Thinly slice plantains and bake or fry until crisp.
Dip half side of the baked(or fried) plantain in melted chocolate.
Sprinkle with chili powder and salt.
Let it set and enjoy.
